WorkItem.ClosedComment: fixed in Changeset 36708.The flame shock periodic damage dps calculation had an errorAs for the relative stat values:I have no idea why they show these numbers, however just changing the haste rating by 1 yields reasonable numbers again.
WorkItem.Description: In the attached saved character, I am wearing the t8.5 elemental chest and no other set pieces, but it is recommending that I choose the t8.5 resto gloves over the t8.5 ele gloves (which would give me a set bonus). Besides sockets and their bonuses, these items have the same stats. When I equip the ele gloves, Rawr says I have the set bonus, but I would do less DPS which makes no sense.

FileAttachments.FileName: D6576 Ele EGR DPT t9p2 t9p2 Lava.xml

Comments.Message: Update: It's giving the Worldbreaker set bonus as a negative value. Did you guys incorporate the 3.2.2 patch changes too early or something similar?

It may also be linked to Rawr giving me negative values for haste, which it really shouldn't do. Even if I'm just edging over a certain sweet spot, it should drop the Haste EP to near zero, not below it I think.

I am today unable to replicate it. I think the issue was due to being hitcapped and having a huge EP for haste so the large difference was due to gemming. Please disregard and I will repost if there's a true issue. I'm really sorry if I wasted you time. I appreciate your time and help.
Opening your file I can see that the Buff is valued negatively. But I don't understand why exactly, because in theory it should always be better having it.
The Worldbreaker 2 piece bonus is negative and haste has a 0 value.  Even when I drop haste on my gear to 0, there is still no listed benefit for haste.
